channel.title: Does anyone know how to fix this error
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to fix this error?
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34yvbzl.png[/img]

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“RsMakerWoad, post:6, topic:459526”][quote author=…nerd123456789 link=topic=562442.msg4100908#msg4100908 date=1347464723]
it means that the client cant connect to you’r ip or source — “server is offline” ----
check if you’r ports 43594 are open and be sure to disable firewall or make exception for it and by checking the google status checker u can see if you’r server is online or not
[/quote]
what he said:P[/quote]
Yup

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to fix this error

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @The_Moparian The Moparian
item.description:
@The_Moparian wrote:

Make sure the server is fully running before starting your client. Also, be sure the ip is correct and the ports are indentical.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to fix this error

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Did you edit your client’s server address? And was your server online when you attempted to run the client?

Here’s a nifty little status checker made by a community member here:
http://projectrainbow.net/index.php?type=14

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

it means that the client cant connect to you’r ip or source — “server is offline” ----
check if you’r ports 43594 are open and be sure to disable firewall or make exception for it and by checking the runelocus status checker u can see if you’r server is online or not
